org.javautil.document.style
Class StyleDefinition

java.lang.Object
  org.javautil.document.style.StyleDefinition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class StyleDefinition
extends Object
implements Cloneable

A style represented in pure string format; more human readable. This class is mostly useful when wiring up style definitions in a spring application context for convenience by beginning java and report developers. See StyleUtil and StyleParser for classes to help use of this class with spring.

Author:
bcm
